edge: A movie is a form of visual entertainment that tells a story through moving images. The plot or storyline of the movie is conveyed through dialogue, action, and narrative.
Satyameva Jayate proposes Lokpal bill in the parliament but due to lack of votes his plea gets rejected
Dadasaheb Balram Azad had had scarified his life for the same which also left his mother in coma
Satyameva Jayate starts to kill corrupt people in the city to stop corruption
The officials decide to appoint a tough cop Jay Balram Azad twin brother of Satya forms rest of the plot
It is revealed that Jay is also involved with his brother in the killings

Satya Balram Azad is the Home Minister of Uttar Pradesh, who secretly commits gruesome vigilante killings in order to provide justice to the oppressed. Due to ongoing killings, the police department assigns Satya's twin brother ACP Jay Balram Azad to investigate the case.

John Abraham stars as the lead actor in Satyameva Jayate 2, portraying a vigilante fighting against corruption.
Bollywood Hungama calls Satyameva Jayate 2 a 'power packed mass entertainer' in their review.
The film received negative reviews from critics, including Anupama Chopra who called it a 'battersome' experience.
As of December 16, 2021, the film has grossed ₹15.79 crore in India and ₹1.50 crore overseas, for a worldwide gross collection of ₹17.29 crore.
The film begins with a visual of the Tricolor.
Murtuza Nullwala of Eastern Eye calls Satyameva Jayate 2 an 'outdated film' in their review.
Sonil Dedhia of News 18 criticizes the film's script, calling it 'tacky'.

Tatsam Mukherjee of Firstpost gave the film a rating of 0/5 and wrote, 'Satyamev Jayate 2 is an ugly exhibition of appeasement filmmaking, where a director is trying to tick off as many boxes of the audience he can appease, using the most tired tropes in the history of Hindi cinema'.

node_2: dangerous idea of justice being doled out by men arrogating to themselves the power to judge, jury, executioner
edge: Shubhra Gupta from The Indian Express gave the film a rating of 0.5/5 and wrote, 'Abraham strides through this thing with his standard mix of fixed-frown-and-swinging-fists. Only once or twice does he do the bare-bodied superhero who can take on all comers with a teeny dimpled nudge-wink. The rest is a string of tired stereotypes and bad story-telling, refreshing the dangerous idea of justice being doled out by men arrogating to themselves the power to judge, jury, executioner'

node_2: dangerous ideas about instant justice and patriotism
edge: Saibal Chatterjee from NDTV gave the film a rating of 1/5 and stated, 'The shoddy cinematic qualities are only one aspect of Satyameva Jayate 2; The film also peddles dangerous ideas about instant justice and patriotism. No Hindi film in living memory has misused the tricolour'
Saibal Chatterjee from NDTV gave the film a rating of 1/5 and criticized the soundtrack by writing, 'The soundtrack is shoddy and ear-splitting'

node_2: shoddy and sloppy depiction of jingoism and vigilantism
edge: Stutee Ghosh from The Quint gave the film a rating of 1/5 and wrote, ‘‘Satyameva Jayate 2 is a shoddy and sloppy depiction of jingoism and vigilantism at its most shameless’’.

Syed Firdaus Ashraf of Rediff gave the film a rating of 1.5/5 and criticized its script by stating, ‘‘Satyamev Jayate 2 has a dated circa 1990s script which won't find acceptance with today's generations’’.

references to the secular fabric of society and women’s safety sound gratuitous

The director Zaveri throws everything in his powers at his barren canvas.
By shooting the same scene from ten angles
and deploying rapid zooms and editing gimmicks, Zaveri hopes that the rampant tackiness will not be apparent
